skills.description: I am more of the one who wants to improve rather than the one who always wants to prove. Will hustle in silence and let my success make the noise.

infoList: Building websites in a team to increase efficiency and to deliver better and faster products
Actively learning and applying HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJS, and Redux
Use JavaScript or CSS3 to improve page speed load and user experience
Creating SPA and multi-page websites using the mobile first technique
Act within my powers as a company director
Promote the success of the company
Declare interest in proposed transaction or arrangement with the company
Greet all customers with fast, friendly, personalised service and develops a rapport with customers
Coordinate and control all aspects of stock deliveries and keep accurate and up to date records
Maintain low wastage levels through good stock management
